PARAM.name: advertise-map-val
PARAM.help: Route map to control attribute advertisement (max 140 chars)

PARAM.name: attribute-map-val
PARAM.help: Route map for parameter control (max 140 chars)

PARAM.name: summary-only
PARAM.help: Filter more specific routes from updates

PARAM.name: suppress-map
PARAM.help: Conditionally filter more specific routes from updates

PARAM.name: reuse-value
PARAM.help: Value to start reusing a route (default = 750)

PARAM.name: start-suppress-time
PARAM.help: Value to start suppressing a route (default = 2000)

PARAM.name: max-suppress-time
PARAM.help: Maximum duration to suppress a stable route (default = 60)

PARAM.name: route-map
PARAM.help: Route-map to specify criteria for dampening

PARAM.help: Distance for routes internal to the AS (default = 200)
